video_prompt: Woman's head turns right, then left, her gaze shifting direct to camera. Rain intensifies and streaks across a blurring, dynamic background of shimmering lights. Her wet hair moves with each head turn. Subtle facial expressions—intense, then softened—change throughout. Her armored costume subtly reflects the shifting lights.
image_prompt: Extremely high-quality, full-body 8K shot of a sleek, athletic woman in futuristic silver metallic body armor. She faces the viewer with a slight left torso turn, intense dark brown eyes, aquiline nose, and faint pink lips with subtle freckles. Her wet, dark hair is slicked back. Shallow depth of field focuses on her against a blurred urban night background of falling rain and glistening bokeh lights, creating a sophisticated and dynamic scene.
refined_video_prompt: Her head pivots right, then left, gaze actively locking with the camera. Rain strengthens, streaking across a dynamically blurring backdrop of shimmering lights. Wet hair fluidly responds to each head turn. Her expressions subtly evolve from intense to softened. The armored surface catches and mirrors the shifting light patterns.
